title: WordPress.com
summary: WordPress.com is a platform for self-publishing that is popular for blogging and other works. It is owned and operated by Automattic, Inc.[3] It is run on a modified version of WordPress.[4] This website provides free blog hosting for registered users and is financially supported via paid upgrades,[5] "VIP" services and advertising. However, WordPress.com is a freemium product whereas WordPress.org is completely free.
